alert.note: Alert for Edwards; Gallatin; Hardin; Saline; Wabash; White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 09 at 4:02AM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A line of showers producing very gusty winds will impact portions of eastern Wayne, Wabash, northeastern Saline, north central Hardin, White, Edwards, eastern Hamilton, Gallatin, northwestern Vanderburgh, Gibson, Posey, west central Henderson and northwestern Union Counties through 445 AM CST... At 359 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking showers producting very gusty winds along a line extending from 6 miles north of Mcleansboro to near Shawneetown. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Fairfield around 415 AM CST. Other locations in the path of these storms include Mount Vernon, New Harmony, Blairsville, Poseyville, Cynthiana and Owensville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Indiana between Mile Markers 23 and 30. Interstate 64 in Indiana between Mile Markers 1 and 29. Interstate 64 in Illinois between Mile Markers 103 and 130. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Edwards; Gallatin; Hardin; Saline; Wabash; White
